com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor

Class EditorPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.EditorPlatform

  • public class EditorPlatform
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods that depends on the platform.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EditorPlatform.Theme
      Themes supported by Scene Builder Kit.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DOCUMENTATION_URL
      This URL is where you go when the user takes Scene Builder Help action (shortcut F1)
      static boolean IS_LINUX
      True if current platform is running Linux.
      static boolean IS_MAC
      True if current platform is running Mac OS X.
      static boolean IS_WINDOWS
      True if current platform is running Windows.
      static java.lang.String JAVADOC_HOME
      Javadoc home (for Inspector and CSS Analyzer properties)

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeStylesheetURLs

        public static java.util.List<java.net.URL> getThemeStylesheetURLs(EditorPlatform.Theme theme)
        Returns the list of url for locating the specified set of stylesheet in jfxrt.jar.
        Parameters:
        theme - theme for which list of url should be computed
        Returns:
        list of url for locating the specified stylesheet.

      • open

        public static void open(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Requests the underlying platform to open a given file. On Linux, it runs 'xdg-open'. On Mac, it runs 'open'. On Windows, it runs 'cmd /c start'.
        Parameters:
        path - path for the file to be opened
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs

      • revealInFileBrowser

        public static void revealInFileBrowser(java.io.File filePath)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Requests the underlying platform to "reveal" the specified folder. On Linux, it runs 'nautilus'. On Mac, it runs 'open'. On Windows, it runs 'explorer /select'.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path for the folder to be revealed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs

      • isContinuousSelectKeyDown

        public static boolean isContinuousSelectKeyDown(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        Returns true if the modifier key for continuous selection is down.
        Parameters:
        e - mouse event to check (never null)
        Returns:
        true if the modifier key for continuous selection is down.

      • isNonContinousSelectKeyDown

        public static boolean isNonContinousSelectKeyDown(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        Returns true if the modifier key for non-continuous selection is down.
        Parameters:
        e - mouse event to check (never null).
        Returns:
        true if the modifier key for non-continuous selection is down.

      • isAssertionEnabled

        public static boolean isAssertionEnabled()
        Returns true if the jvm is running with assertions enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the jvm is running with assertions enabled.
